creator.description:
Labels for developers creating & reporting on the Roblox platform. To receive a label, see: https://bsky.app/profile/labeller.roblox.social/post/3l7dvtjcbeq23

Ran by @andourys.dev

locales.description: Anyone who is directly involved in creating Roblox experiences. This includes programmers, community managers, modelers, animators, composers, artists, etc.
locales.name: Roblox Dev

locales.description: Any Roblox experience/game that is currently under development or actively maintained.
locales.name: Roblox Game

locales.description: Companies/Studios that actively create and contribute to the development of experiences/games on Roblox.
locales.name: Roblox Game Studio

locales.description:
Only verified users employed at Roblox Corporation may receive this label. 

✅ This profile was verified through independent means.
locales.name: Roblox Employee

locales.description:
This profile is dedicated to sharing news about Roblox. 

✅ This profile was verified through independent means.
locales.name: Roblox News

locales.description:
Anyone that has created or contributed to top engaging experiences on the platform. 

✅ This profile was verified through independent means.
locales.name: Roblox Top Engaging Experiences
